Well, Adam.  First of all, there are therapists that can help you with your bitterness.  We've all been newbs at some point.  There are several ways that they could be misguided by using search engines, while the answers to their simple questions can be answered in a matter of minutes by people with more experience in these matters.

For the newbs: There are a couple of ways to access the game.  If you have a PS2, you can burn the image file to a blank DVD and INSTANT GAME.  To run it on your computer, put the disc in your computer and run it through an emulator of your choice.  Possibly the most popular is PCSX2.  If you can't burn DVDs or just don't want to waste the disc, get a program called MagicDisc by the makers of MagicISO.  It will allow you to make your computer think it has an extra disc drive that you can only load ISOs on.  From there, just act like you have the disc in the drive and use the emulator.  For more detail instructions on each of these programs, go to their respective help pages for walkthroughs and demonstrations.
